title.narrative: Provendia Power Line Corridor Imaging and Inspection

description.narrative: The project objective is to conclude long-term cooperation agreements with local partners regarding the aerial imaging of the grid infrastructure in Ethiopia etc. The Finnish software company Sharper Shape has developed new technology for aerial imaging of infrastructure assets and a software-as-a-service cloud platform for digitalized and automated asset inspection. The project team = Provendia has researched and interacted with numerous sub-Saharan national electricity transmission companies since 2016 ab out their present practices of power line inspection and processes of maintenance. The learnings of the research are strongly suggesting that Sharper Shape technology and Provendia developed operational service concept jointly would provide faster effectiv e more structured/effective and cost saving method for power line asset and power line corridor inspection/repair/maintenance processes and such service is especially expedient for utilities in sub-Saharan Africa.This project is to demonstrate the full ope rational and deployment process of Provendia concept for two east-African and two west-African utilities during year 2019. The project includes producing/assembling imaging sensor equipment taylored to best suite the sub-Saharan utlity requirement.
